stepAnswer: SELECT EmployeeName FROM Employees WHERE Department $$ \neq $$ 'Sales';
stepTitle: Choose the correct SQL statement that retrieves all employees except those in the 'Sales' department.
answerLatex: SELECT EmployeeName FROM Employees WHERE Department $$ \neq $$ 'Sales';
choices: SELECT EmployeeName FROM Employees WHERE Department $$=$$ 'Sales';
SELECT EmployeeName FROM Employees WHERE Department IS NOT 'Sales';
SELECT EmployeeName FROM Employees WHERE Department $$ \neq $$ 'Sales';
SELECT EmployeeName FROM Employees WHERE Department $$=$$ 'HR' OR 'IT';
